Articles.Content:
Let me say first this is the first plugin I have ever made. I'm not sure if there's another one out there that already does this or if anyone will even like it. I also want to say thanks to the people on the forum who were a big help with some of the questions I had.

With that said what I created was a plugin that goes along with a part that currently is using the RCS Block model. For each of these parts that are put onto the ship a box spawns that has two sliders. The first slider controls the amount of thrust upwards and the second slider controls drag which help to stabilize.

There is a bunch more that I want to do with this plugin but I don't know how to do all that I want.

Things I'd like to add or fix-

1. More Stability

2. Ability to lift heavier crafts with no issues

3. Make all sliders in one convenient box

4. A new model for the part

5. General tidying and Prettying

known issue-

you have to have the rcs block facing right for some reason.

if this is up-right with the bulk of the text on the front towards the top then turning it clockwise once will make it work.

http://www.gogofile.com/Default.aspx?p=sc&ID=635217925749291250_6894 <---- you can download here. the spaceport sucks for uploading.

Also if anyone wants to help make this mod better I could definitely use the help. Again I am very new at this stuff.

Hope someone will enjoy this.
